text: Andrew Joseph Cohen (born June 2, 1968) is an American talk show host, producer and writer. He is the host and executive producer of Bravo's late night talk show, Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen. He also hosted the dating game show Love Connection. Cohen was born in St. Louis, Missouri. He is Jewish. He is openly gay. He has a son. title: Andy Cohen
